title: Caserio da Castineira
description: Small village at the foot of Serra do Burgo 10 minutes from Sil Canyons, 32km from Manzaneda Ski Resort. Offers 4 apartments and a double room, on the various buildings of former manor house, woodshed, barns & stables. Large common area with library, games area, Wi-Fi, fireplace. Spectacular forest views. Vegan organic cooking. Offers hipotoxic cleansing diets, fasting, and various therapies. See website for more details.
